humanitarian_and_compassionate_grounds: adaptability in Canada does not guarantee permanent residency
decision_reasoning: applicant failed to demonstrate unusual hardship or personal risk upon returning to the DRC
applicable_regulations: Section 25(1) of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
application_details: Congolese citizen with multiple unsuccessful applications for refugee status and humanitarian grounds
result_of_case: Application for judicial review dismissed; no violation of Charter rights found
